price: He said, “Rather, it was this biggest one who did it. So ask them, if they can speak!”
arabic: قَالَ بَلۡ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمۡ هَٰذَا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُمۡ إِن كَانُواْ يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla bal faʿalahu kabīruhum hādhā fasalūhum in kānū yanṭiqūna
